Key Arguments: The proposed bill is unnecessary and would cause confusion.
Honesty should be taught from a young age at home and in schools.
Australia should not allow dishonesty as it harms societal fabric.
Notable Quotes: We should be taught to speak/write honestly, always.
If dishonesty is permitted then the whole of society is on an unsure footing.
I totally condemn the use of dishonesty in either act or deed or the spoken word.
